column4: hey guys, could i write a script to ignore middle click duplicates?
That would be really hard unless you modified the mouse driver.  If you stay out of the driver you'd have to figure out what the double click did and then undo it everytime.

The problem is that the mouse has a hardware problem, and unless you are very very careful when middle-clicking, you will often get two or three clicks almost instantly (I only middle-click in ff, so it only really needs to be fixed for that)
Can you change the settings in System -> Preferences for double click speed?  Will that help?
